game.name: BFF Fest Festival
game.description:
The beautiful princess Ariel loves spending time with her bestie Rapunzel. These two beauties are the best friend and always get ready to meet and enjoy their time together. Recently they heard about the most popular Oktoberfest festival that is going to be held in Germany in the coming days. They have also made out a plan to attend the festival. But the problem is that the huge collection of dresses has made them confused. Can you help them out? Join BFF Fest Festival and be prepared to pick up the best outfits!

Her wardrobe is full of trendy and fashionable dresses that are perfect for the festival. These both girls have faith on your fashion ability and style sense so feel free to mix and match as many dress options as you can to create the jaw-dropping looks for them. Choose the girl and get ready to give her the rocking festival appearance! Dress her up with a yellow and green color frock or a short blue and black color with a yellow color ribbon on its bottom! Then give her a perfect hairdo and a nice matching pair of leggings.

Complete her look with a lovely pair of shoes and a wonderful drink! Once it is done, click the next button to help the other girl choose the best festival outfit. Dress her up with a white and pink color short outfit or white and brown long outfit with pink design on its bottom in this one of the best HTML5 dressing games for girls! Combine her dress with a cool hairdo, drink as well as a pair of sandals & leggings! Hope you would have a great fun in our other more popular titles from the category of dress-up games that are playable on multiple devices, no download required!
